post.author: goliathvt
post.body:
Hey folks. Pardon the shameless plug, but the shoutcasting crew I work with over at EnemyTerritory.tv went to QuakeCon this year and we've been slowly getting all of our content out to the masses over the last few days (we had no useful bandwidth for uploading large vids while at QCon). Our coverage includes the Keynote and Press Conference in its entirety, a video tour of the event, me being playing with some Bawls, and much more.

Enjoy!

http://www.enemyterritory.tv

http://quakecon.enemyterritory.tv

post.author: TelMarine
post.body: yeah thanks a bunch for the videos, especially conferece+keynote+q&a

post.author: rebb
post.body: Thank you Mr. Greased Person

post.author: Mordenkainen
post.body: Hey man, thanks for these. Could you tell if the audio feed is just the audio channel of the video? Because the last half hour of that is almost imperceptible, it's like JC was giving his keynote in a busy restaurant. It's not your fault obviously people that people start to leave the room and, apparently, play cards? during the keynote. I just wanted to know if there's any point in downloading the 1.2gb video if it's not any clearer than the audio feed. Thanks again man.

Because the last half hour of that is almost imperceptible, it's like JC was giving his keynote in a busy restaurant. It's not your fault obviously people that people start to leave the room and, apparently, play cards? during the keynote. I just wanted to know if there's any point in downloading the 1.2gb video if it's not any clearer than the audio feed. Thanks again man.
